get.description:
This Resource provides a mechanism for a Server to expose information to an
interested party with regard to error or other conditions that the Device is experiencing (Alerts).
category is a string that contains the Device defined category for the Alert.
timestamp is an RFC3339 formatted time at which the Alert was generated.
originatorid is a string that contains the identity of the originator of the Alert.
severity is an integer that contains the RFC5424 defined severity of the Alert.
subject is an array containing human readable text in one or more languages.
accountid is a string containing the identity of the account with which the Device is associated.
Retrieves the current alert information.

category.description: Category into which the notification is classified

timestamp.description: An RFC3339 formated time indicating when the data was observed (e.g.: 2016-02-15T09:19Z, 1996-12-19T16:39:57-08:00)

allOf.description: An identifier formatted according to IETF RFC 5646 (langusge tag).

value.description: Alert subject matter in the indicated language.

originatorid.description: ID of the creator of the event

id.description: Instance ID of this specific Resource

if.description: The OCF Interfaces supported by this Resource
